hero.subtitle: Our AI-powered app helps you identify your unique productivity bottlenecks and provides a personalized action plan to conquer them.

showcase.title: BeProductive App
showcase.description: Transform your productivity with AI-powered insights

personalized.title: Personalized Insights
personalized.description: Understand your unique work patterns and discover what truly drives your productivity.

habits.title: Smart Habit Tracking
habits.description: Build powerful routines with intelligent reminders and progress visualization.

goals.title: Goal Alignment
goals.description: Break down big goals into manageable steps and stay focused on what matters most.

progress.title: Progress Visualization
progress.description: See your achievements, track your growth, and stay motivated with clear visual reports.

howItWorks.title: Ready to Boost Your Productivity?
howItWorks.description: Take our quick, AI-driven assessment to pinpoint your productivity challenges and get your custom action plan. It takes just 3 minutes!

beta.title: Join Our Early Access Program
beta.description: Be among the first to experience BeProductive. Sign up for exclusive early access and shape the future of productivity.
beta.successMessage: Thank you for your interest! We'll be in touch soon.
beta.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions about BeProductive? Need help getting started? We're here to assist you.
